reviews.text: É claro que não seria algo grandioso pois o Governador Valadares é uma cidade pequena. Ademais, havia uma área não completa que parecia ser meio abandonada. No entanto, o conteúdo apresentado neste museu é muito informador sobre a cidade, verdadeiramente aprendi muito sobre a cidade do meu pai e senti mais orgulho da história da minha família. Além do mais, a arquitetura antiga preservada agrada os olhos. O atendimento também foi ótimo, as moças que trabalham lá conversavam conosco e nos ofereciam mais informações sobre o museu e a cidade. É uma pena que muitos não conhecem este museu, pois realmente vale a pena o visitar para conhecer cada vez mais a nossa história!
Uma excelente opção para conhecer a história de Governador Valadares. O acervo poderia melhorar. A planta original da cidade precisa de restauração urgente.
Me surpreendeu. Apesar do espaço ser alugado, tem muitos atrativos e retrata a história da cidade. Mais pessoas deveriam conhecer.
Relembrei de coisas que fizeram parte da minha família e da minha vida.

A nice place to remember your Nostalgia, but only most of the goods being sold are apparel and fabrics. The innovative stalls where we could find some gadgets are very, very few in number. You get excellent deals if you are an able bargainer. Otherwise the stalls are routine. Most of the big brands have disappeared totally from the scene.

Good place for buying things from bedding, dining, real estate and especially kitchen ware you will find multiple kinds and varieties of things to buy for kitchen.
Will find different kinds of eatables.

Coming to fun part, they are providing almost 20 rides/games for which we need to pay individually for each ride.

Finally the ultimate thing is the dressing for girls and women
Lots lots of varieties of dresses available for them to buy.

In a way you can spent some good time if you like to spend time in crowded places.

P.S if you don’t like crowds then please don’t visit, at least on week ends.

You can find everything you want in one place. There are many stalls for clothes , fabrics and other crafts. The hand made crafts are really good. You ll love  home made chocolates in many flavors. Kids will love their being here. Commuting to this place is also easy through metro. ( Right next to the Nampally metro station). One thing I didn't like is not all the food stalls are tasty.

The exhibition is a great place to go if you are looking for a good time and range of things to buy. It's usually crowded. Be prepared to bargain. Use experience to guess the quality of things being sold. Most stall owners are helpful and kind. Food is good. Rides are fun for people of all ages.

Annual celebrations event. A popular, prestigious and historic one in Hyderabad. Very good. One can have plenty of varieties in clothing, crockery, artificial jewellery, type of food both veg and non veg, gift items, some noted companies stalls, all regular items etc. One can have a nice experience. However one should have bargain knowledge or approx rates of items of which they are looking for.
